_header: It was upon a Saturday a little before prime
Subjects: Virgin Mary; Christ, birth of; Christ, Passion of; devil
_description: The birth and crucifixion of Christ — six couplets

OxfLinLat130.Transcription:
It was up on a Saturday a litul bifore primeur ladi wento bedlem so
                    ver wel awfter ir timse ne wepe ne se ne wre but se mad god
                    elyr(?)ihesu oute of her bodi ibronge as blossum of þe
                    brereÞe iwhus & Þe serysenus tokenet(?) hym to redeWat
                    þen mytt ihesu criste wrste lyf to ledeÞey bluffed hym Þey
                    bobut hym Þey dede hym on þe rodeÞey bede [ hole ]
                    hym [and(?) hole ] schurning Þat al he spraa(?) blodÞey
                    co[ hole ] oure ladi marie & seyde wt mylde st[euen?
                        edge ]Dere loue wy sofrysst [ hole ] as & Þw
                    heyr kyng of heuenLedi mote sufre Þy [ hole ] for al men
                    sakeNor helles wade Þe fule fende here fryly[s? worn ]
                    take
